data.message: We sat next to the African American girl in court today.. I was happy she was there... our court dates must coincide. I didn't speak to her because I had to speak with my attorney but my sister did. My sister gave her her telephone number and told her to call if she needed anything. The girl said they took her baby away because he had a full diaper and she yelled at him... that's all. How can you even do that?

replies.message: The people in the shelter and other low income programs scope out potential kids for protective services to take by identifying who cannot defend themselves and is alone.
That's where she was I think... a shelter or the women's shelter
